title: Black Agenda: A conversation with Anna Gifty Opoku-Agyeman
description: Anna Gifty Opoku-Agyeman is a rising star in the world of economics. Today, she joins us to talk about the collection of essays she edited, Black Agenda: Bold Solutions for a Broken System.
